name: Paranoia
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Sanity and Madness/Types of Insanity/Paranoia
effect: -4 penalty on Will saves and Charisma-based skill checks; cannot receive benefit from or attempt the Aid Another action; cannot willingly accept aid (including healing) from another creature unless he makes a Will save against his insanity's DC

sections.body: The paranoid character is convinced that the world and all that dwell within it are out to get him. Paranoid characters are typically argumentative or introverted.
